definitions.text: a formal entry into an organization or position or office
examples: he was ordered to report for induction into the army
he gave a speech as part of his installation into the hall of fame

definitions.text: the act of starting something for the first time; introducing something new
examples: she looked forward to her initiation as an adult
the foundation of a new scientific society

definitions.text: wisdom as evidenced by the possession of knowledge
examples: his dullness was due to lack of initiation

definitions.text: an act that sets in motion some course of events
